LanguageData.TTFM_CannotObstructFrontOfMirror: Front of mirror cannot be obstructed.
LanguageData.TTFM_MirrorMustBeAboveWall: When facing north, mirror must be placed directly above a wall.
LanguageData.TTFM_MirrorMustBeOnWall: Mirror must be placed directly onto wall.
LanguageData.TTFM_QuiltMustBeOnBed: Quilt must be placed on bed of the same size.
LanguageData.TTFM_QuiltMustBeSameDirection: Quilt must be facing the same direction as bed.
